name: CUBOS (BoostedBroccoli)
description:
The World of Cubos XXI

The Great Brittleness is plaguing Stonekind.

Stone shatters and blocks break for apparently no reason. Buildings, which have withstood wind and weather for ages, collapse. But Cubos XXI knows better.
He was born with strange markings all over his body, and his grandfather told him off a prophecy, which has been passed down the Cubos-Limeline since Cubos I.
Now he is on his way to restore order, leading him and his companions, Boulnard and Marbelline, up the Mount Olympus at last.


The Game

In the game the player takes control of the three companions, guiding them through a series of puzzles. The puzzles can be solved by cleverly placing each character in the correct spots, pushing buttons and powering conduits to open paths for the others.

Can you help Cubos and his friends brace the challenges waiting for them?
Guide the companions through four challenging puzzles and recover the lost prophecy.
